verses.verse: Paul, <WG3972> an apostle <WG652> of Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> according <WG2596> to the commandment <WG2003> of God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Savior, <WG4990> and <WG2532> <WG2962> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> hope; <WG1680>

to Timothy, <WG5095> my true <WG1103> child <WG5043> in <WG1722> faith: <WG4102> Grace, <WG5485> mercy, <WG1656> and peace, <WG1515> from <WG575> God <WG2316> our <WG2257> Father <WG3962> and <WG2532> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord. <WG2962>

As <WG2531> I urged <WG3870> you <WG4571> when I was going <WG4198> into <WG1519> Macedonia, <WG3109> stay <WG4357> at <WG1722> Ephesus <WG2181> that <WG2443> you might command <WG3853> certain <WG5100> men not <WG3361> to teach <WG2085> a different doctrine, <WG2085>

neither <WG3366> to pay attention to <WG4337> myths <WG3454> and <WG2532> endless <WG562> genealogies, <WG1076> which <WG3748> cause <WG3930> disputes, <WG2214> rather <WG3123> than <WG2228> God <WG2316>'s stewardship, <WG3620> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> faith <WG4102>â€”

but <WG1161> the goal <WG5056> of <WG1537> this command <WG3852> is <WG2076> love, <WG1537> out of a pure <WG2513> heart <WG2588> and <WG2532> a good <WG18> conscience <WG4893> and <WG2532> sincere <WG505> faith; <WG4102>
from which <WG3739> things some, <WG5100> having missed the mark, <WG795> have turned aside <WG1624> to <WG1519> vain talking; <WG3150>

desiring <WG2309> to be <WG1511> teachers of the law, <WG3547> though they understand <WG3539> neither <WG3383> what <WG3739> they say, <WG3004> nor <WG3383> about what <WG3739> they strongly affirm. <WG1226>
But <WG1161> we know <WG1492> that <WG3754> the law <WG3551> is good, <WG2570> if <WG1437> a man <WG5100> uses <WG5530> it <WG846> lawfully, <WG3545>

as knowing <WG1492> this, <WG5124> that <WG3754> law <WG3551> is <WG2749> not <WG3756> made for <WG2749> a righteous man, <WG1342> but <WG1161> for the lawless <WG459> and <WG2532> insubordinate, <WG506> for the ungodly <WG765> and <WG2532> sinners, <WG268> for the unholy <WG462> and <WG2532> profane, <WG952> for murderers of fathers <WG3964> and <WG2532> murderers of mothers, <WG3389> for manslayers, <WG409>

for the sexually immoral, <WG4205> for homosexuals, <WG733> for slave-traders, <WG405> for liars, <WG5583> for perjurers, <WG1965> and <WG2532> for <WG480> any <WG5100> other <WG480> thing <WG2087> contrary to <WG480> the sound <WG5198> doctrine; <WG1319>
according to <WG2596> the Good News <WG2098> of the glory <WG1391> of the blessed <WG3107> God, <WG2316> which <WG3739> was committed to <WG4100> my <WG1473> trust. <WG4100>

And <WG2532> I <WG2192> thank <WG5485> him who enabled <WG1743> me, <WG3165> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> our <WG2257> Lord, <WG2962> because <WG3754> he counted <WG2233> me <WG3165> faithful, <WG4103> appointing me <WG5087> to <WG1519> service; <WG1248>

although I was <WG5607> before <WG4386> a blasphemer, <WG989> a <WG2532> persecutor, <WG1376> and <WG2532> insolent. <WG5197> However, <WG235> I obtained mercy, <WG1653> because <WG3754> I did <WG4160> it ignorantly <WG50> in <WG1722> unbelief. <WG570>

The <WG1161> grace <WG5485> of our <WG2257> Lord <WG2962> abounded <WG5250> exceedingly with <WG3326> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> love <WG26> which is <WG3588> in <WG1722> Christ <WG5547> Jesus. <WG2424>

The <WG3588> saying <WG3056> is faithful <WG4103> and <WG2532> worthy <WG514> of all <WG3956> acceptance, <WG594> that <WG3754> Christ <WG5547> Jesus <WG2424> came <WG2064> into <WG1519> the world <WG2889> to save <WG4982> sinners; <WG268> of whom <WG3739> I <WG1473> am <WG1510> chief. <WG4413>

However, <WG235> for <WG1223> this cause <WG5124> I obtained mercy, <WG1653> that <WG2443> in <WG1722> me <WG1698> first, <WG4413> Jesus <WG2424> Christ <WG5547> might display <WG1731> all <WG3956> his patience, <WG4314> for an example <WG5296> of those who were going <WG3195> to <WG1519> believe <WG4100> in <WG1909> him <WG846> for <WG1519> eternal <WG166> life. <WG2222>

Now <WG1161> to the King <WG935> eternal, <WG165> immortal, <WG862> invisible, <WG517> to God <WG2316> who alone <WG3441> is wise, <WG4680> be honor <WG5092> and <WG2532> glory <WG1391> forever <WG165> and <WG2532> ever. <WG165> Amen. <WG281>

This <WG3778> instruction <WG3852> I commit <WG3908> to <WG2596> you, <WG4671> my child <WG5043> Timothy, <WG5095> according to <WG2596> the prophecies <WG4394> which led <WG4254> the way <WG1909> to you, <WG4571> that <WG2443> by <WG1722> them <WG846> you may wage <WG4754> the good <WG2570> warfare; <WG4754>

holding <WG2192> faith <WG4102> and <WG2532> a good <WG18> conscience; <WG4893> which <WG3739> some <WG5100> having thrust away <WG683> made a shipwreck <WG3489> concerning <WG4012> the faith; <WG4102>

of whom <WG3739> is <WG2076> Hymenaeus <WG5211> and <WG2532> Alexander; <WG223> whom <WG3739> I delivered <WG3860> to Satan, <WG4567> that <WG2443> they might be taught <WG3811> not <WG3361> to blaspheme. <WG987>
